basics.name: Qiye Zhou
basics.label: Software Engineer
basics.summary: Experienced problem-solver, dedicated team player, and quick learner with a task-oriented approach. Proven ability to manage resources effectively and deliver innovative solutions to complex challenges. Passionate about technology and equipped with strong analytical and problem-solving skills. Holding a BSc in Engineering and an MSc in Computing, currently residing in the UK on a spouse visa. Eager to leverage my skills in the IT industry and contribute to impactful projects.

work.name: Dayingjia Leisure Club
work.summary: Led business strategy and product development for a leisure services startup
highlights: Studied market to determine optimal pricing of services and capitalize on emerging opportunities
Drove product development from concept to launch, ensuring alignment with customer needs
Conducted target market research to scope out industry competition and identify advantageous trends
Established strong partnerships with key industry players for greater market presence

work.name: Magic Mirror LTD
work.summary: Managed software development projects and cross-functional teams
highlights: Maintained strong relationships with external vendors and stakeholders, ensuring timely delivery of resources, services, and support to drive successful project outcomes
Directed cross-functional teams throughout the software development lifecycle, delivering high-quality products on time and within budget
Oversaw optimization initiatives to improve software scalability and performance, aligning system capabilities with the needs of an expanding user base
